newsitem.title: UK: London shares end higher but market stays cautious.
newsitem.headline: London shares end higher but market stays cautious.

text.p: UK shares closed within striking distance of their all-time highs on Friday, cheered by a firm start on Wall Street.
But further gains next week are seen limited as some participants fear markets on both sides of the Atlantic may be on the verge of a downward correction.

"The FTSE is still on the over-bought side and I think there is going to be a sharp correction at some stage, perhaps starting next week," said Richard Marshall, strategist at Investment Research of Cambridge Ltd.
